author: lektran
msg: URLs defined as javascript variables shouldn't be xhtml encoded because when they are assigned to an element's url attribute (action, href, etc.) the browser doesn't decode them before using them.
Applied patch from Deepak Dixit OFBIZ-3860 and additionally fixed some others that I found.
